title: telem
description: A telemetry sample from a vessel in transit.

time.description: The time the telemetry was sampled.

latlong.description: The lat/lon of the vessel at the time.

loc.description: The location of the vessel at the time.

place.description: The place that the lat/lon geocodes to.

accuracy.description: The horizontal accuracy of the latlong sample.

draft.description: The keel depth at the time.

airdraft.description: The maximum height of the ship from the waterline.
